thread.title: Bwin confirms revised offer from 888 Holdings
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Bwin confirms revised offer from 888 Holdings | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Bwin confirms revised offer from 888 Holdings
text:
Sept 1 Bwin.Party Digital Entertainment Plc :
* Confirms it has also now received a revised proposal from 888 Holdings Plc
* Board of Bwin.Party is evaluating this proposal, together with that received from GVC, and intends to consult with its key shareholders in coming days
* Board's unanimous recommendation of 888's offer, which was announced on July 17 2015, remains unchanged
* Revised proposal is subject to a number of pre-conditions (which can be waived in whole or in part by 888) Source text for Eikon: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
